title: Requirements Gathering
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the HapticHologramInteractor system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architectural design for the HapticHologramInteractor system, including hardware, software, and networking components.

title: Holographic Display Development
description: Design and implement the software for creating and displaying holograms in real-time.

title: Haptic Feedback Implementation
description: Develop and integrate the haptic feedback system to provide a physical interaction experience with the displayed holograms.

title: Integration of Hardware Components
description: Assemble and configure the necessary hardware components for the HapticHologramInteractor system.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform functional, usability, compatibility, and performance testing to ensure the system meets requirements and performs as expected.

title: Documentation and Technical Writing
description: Write comprehensive user manuals, API documentation, and other technical resources for the HapticHologramInteractor system.
